name: Toucy Bobble
description:
A joyous 2D bubble popping puzzle game inspired by the classic Puzzle Bobble!

Enrol in our mini course to learn how to make this game in Godot 3.4 today!

Come and learn how to make games like this, or just play for free!

Works great with a controller!
KEYS:

  • A or Left Cursor: Left
  • D or Right Cursor: Right
  • Q: Nudge Left
  • E: Nudge Right
  • Space: Launch bubble

Controller Controls that control things 

  • Left Stick : Left/Right
  • XBox A/DualShock Cross/Nintendo B: Fire
  • Shoulder Buttons: Nudge Left/Right
